About.Name: Meriem Idris
About.AboutText:
Hi, I am Meriem Idris. I am a passionate computer science student with a keen interest in software development, UX Design, and programming. Currently, I am pursuing my undergraduate degree at Seattle Pacific University. I am dedicated to expanding my knowledge and skills in various areas of computer science, with a particular focus on C++ programming.

I enjoy tackling challenging programming projects and I thrive in collaborative environments where I can contribute my expertise and learn from my peers.

Beyond the classroom, I actively engage in extracurricular activities related to computer science, including hackathons, coding competitions, and open-source contributions. I believe in the importance of continuous learning and seek out opportunities to explore new technologies and methodologies.

Experience.ExperienceText:
I am currently interning with the 'How's Life?' app as a software developer!

I have a passion for programming and enjoy creating cute websites and games. In my free time, I love to draw, go on walks, and work on various coding projects. Developing new applications and learning about emerging technologies keeps me inspired and motivated. Balancing creativity with technical skills allows me to constantly innovate and improve my craft.
Experience.EducationText: I major in BA Compute science and minor in Data Analytics
Experience.EmploymentText: I currently intern with How's Life.
Experience.SkillsText: Data Structures, Web Development, Data Analytics, Statistical Analysis, Leadership.

Project1.Title: FITBUDDY
Project1.Desc: FitBuddy is a comprehensive fitness application designed to enhance personal health and wellness through personalized workout plans, nutrition guidance, and community engagement. The app offers users a customizable and interactive experience, adjusting to their individual fitness needs and goals. By featuring advanced features such as AI-powered training and social support, FitBuddy aims to provide an effective and motivating fitness solution for users of all levels.

Project2.Title: Gulp
Project2.Desc: I developed a user-friendly React Native app for seamless water with a couple teammates. The appâ€™s focus is Intake tracking of water. It features record management using Mongo DB and SQLite.

Project3.Title: Interesting Project 3
Project3.Desc: TDeveloped a user-friendly game using Scratch and Visual Studio Code of a running cat that must overcome obstacles such as walls, balls, and birds.
